item.title: 亚洲开盘涨跌不一，科技股反弹提振美股：市场综述
item.description: 在全球最大科技公司的反弹带动美股反弹之后，亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一。【原文：Equities in Asia are poised for a mixed open after a rally in the world’s largest technology companies drove a rebound in US stocks.】

item.title: 石油制裁期限临近，美国与委内瑞拉在墨西哥秘密会面
item.description: 美国官员本周秘密会见了委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗的政府成员，目的是在恢复对该国石油业制裁的最后期限临近之际，让马杜罗继续参与民主改革谈判。【原文：US officials met secretly this week with members of Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro’s administration to keep him engaged in negotiations over democratic reforms as a deadline nears to reinstate sanctions against the nation’s oil industry.】

item.title: 印度顶级交易员赚取百万美元薪酬
item.description:
财富激增、中国转向和对错失机会的恐惧使印度成为全球招聘的新热点。【原文：

Wealth surge, China pivot and a fear of missing out have made India a new global hiring hotspot.

】

item.title: 前麦格理银行家的激进对冲基金策略飙升 42
item.description: 澳大利亚最杰出的激进对冲基金之一的回报率几乎是该国基准股票指数的两倍，因为这种一度被人回避的投资风格正变得越来越流行。【原文：One of Australia’s most-prominent activist hedge funds is notching returns nearly double that of the country’s benchmark stock index, as the once-shunned investment style becomes increasingly popular.】

item.title: Impax 首席执行官表示，ESG 行业将经受住特朗普获胜的考验
item.description: 英派斯资产管理公司（Impax Asset management）创始人兼首席执行官伊恩-西姆（Ian Simm）表示，专注于环境、社会和治理因素的投资基金将能够抵御唐纳德-特朗普在今年 11 月美国总统大选中的胜利。【原文：Investment funds focused on environmental, social and governance factors will be able to withstand a victory by Donald Trump in the US Presidential election this November, according to Ian Simm, the founder and CEO of Impax Asset management.】

item.title: 液化天然气进口商新堡垒能源公司裁减伦敦贸易部员工
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁韦斯-埃登斯（Wes Edens）的新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Billionaire Wes Edens’ New Fortress Energy Inc. has dismissed a liquefied natural gas trader and a strategist in London, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 恩度出售 25 亿美元债务，为摆脱破产提供资金
item.description: 在法官上个月批准了恩度国际公司的债务重组后，银行出售了 25 亿美元的债券和贷款，为该公司摆脱破产保护提供资金。【原文：Banks sold $2.5 billion in bonds and loans to fund Endo International’s emergence from Chapter 11 after a judge approved the drugmaker’s debt restructuring last month.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯计划在大修中裁员并削减钢铁产能
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）计划大幅裁员，同时削减炼钢产能，因为该公司正努力在扭亏为盈方面取得进展。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG plans substantial job cuts alongside a reduction in steelmaking capacity as the company struggles to make progress in turning around the business.】

item.title: 贝莱德有望逃出德州黑名单
item.description: 得克萨斯州副州长丹-帕特里克（Dan Patrick）向贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Texas Lieutenant Governor Dan Patrick offered a sliver of hope to BlackRock Inc. that it may be eventually removed from the state’s list of oil boycotters.】

item.title: 人工智能炒作刺激热门 IPO 后，Reddit、Astera 面临分析师审查
item.description: Reddit Inc. 和 Astera Labs Inc. 赢得了投资者对人工智能的追捧。下周一，上个月帮助它们上市的银行分析师们将有机会评判它们的涨势是否合理。【原文：Reddit Inc. and Astera Labs Inc. have won over investors piling into anything with an artificial-intelligence flavor. Come Monday, analysts at the banks that helped take them public last month will get a shot at weighing in on whether their rallies are warranted.】

item.title: 随着回购禁令的到来，S&P 500 指数将陷入困境
item.description: 由于公司股票回购这一重要支柱因盈前停牌而暂时中止，交易员们正为美股遭遇困境做好准备。【原文：Traders are bracing for US stocks to hit a rough patch as a crucial pillar of support — corporate stock buybacks — are temporarily put on hiatus due to pre-earnings blackouts.】

item.title: 年内最高国债收益率未能吸引买家参与拍卖
item.description: 习惯于将国债收益率的每一次上升都视为买入机会的债券投资者正在重新考虑。【原文：Bond investors who were in the habit of treating every tick higher in Treasury yields as a buying opportunity are having second thoughts.】

item.title: 法国银行调查显示法国经济增长可能已经加速
item.description: 法国中央银行的一项调查显示，法国经济在经历了半年的勉强增长后，第一季度可能略有加快。【原文：The French economy probably notched up slightly faster growth in the first quarter after half a year of barely expanding, according to a survey by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 法国总统阿塔尔称欧盟与加拿大的贸易协定是 "双赢 "协议
item.description: 法国总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔（Gabriel Attal）在访问渥太华期间为欧盟与加拿大的贸易协议辩护，称尽管在参议院遭遇挫折，但他相信该协议将在法国取得进展。【原文：French Prime Minister Gabriel Attal defended the European Union’s trade deal with Canada during a visit to Ottawa, saying he had faith it would move forward in his country despite a setback in the Senate.】

item.title: 亚马逊与大型科技公司一起创下历史新高，涨势仍在继续
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.）与其他科技巨头 Meta Platforms 公司、微软公司（Microsoft Corp.【原文：Amazon.com Inc. joined fellow technology behemoths Meta Platforms Inc., Microsoft Corp., and Nvidia Corp. in setting a fresh record as the e-commerce and cloud computing giant’s shares extended gains.】

item.title: 少数欧洲央行官员需要更多说服才能支持按兵不动
item.description: 2024年4月11日星期四，德国法兰克福，欧洲中央银行（ECB）行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）在利率决议新闻发布会上。欧洲央行在第五次会议上维持利率稳定，同时发出了迄今为止最明确的信号，即通胀降温将很快允许欧洲央行开始削减利率。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Christine Lagarde, president of the European Central Bank (ECB), at a rates decision news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, on Thursday, April 11, 2024. The ECB held interest rates steady for a fifth meeting, while sending its clearest signal yet that cooling inflation will soon allow it to commence cuts. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰通过房产贷款交易发现 5 万亿美元商机
item.description: 在同意收购房地产贷款公司 Prima Capital Advisors 之后，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. is seeking to strike deals in the property market — an opportunity its co-president estimates could be $5 trillion or more — after agreeing to buy real estate lender Prima Capital Advisors.】

item.title: 汇丰银行和巴克莱银行为泰晤士河水务公司做空做市
item.description: 在英国最大的水务公司危机不断升级之际，巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）和汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的信贷交易员也在为客户做市，押注泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的债务。【原文：Credit traders at Barclays Plc and HSBC Holdings Plc are among those making a market for clients to bet against the debt of Thames Water amid an escalating crisis at the UK’s largest water utility.】

item.title: 阿斯利康股东投票赞成支付首席执行官 1,900 万英镑薪酬
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）股东支持帕斯卡尔-索里奥（Pascal Soriot）加薪，他已经是英国富时 100 指数中薪酬最高的公司首席执行官。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc shareholders backed a pay increase for Pascal Soriot, who is already the highest paid chief executive officer of a company in the UK’s FTSE 100 stock index.】

item.title: 德意志银行称美联储 12 月前不会首次降息
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的经济学家们加入了越来越多的预测者行列，在消费者价格指数连续第三个月以快于预期的速度上升后，他们纷纷调低了对美国降息的预期。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG’s economists joined the growing crowd of forecasters who are dialing back expectations for US interest-rate cuts after the consumer-price index rose at a faster-than-expected pace for a third straight month.】

item.title: 福特降价引发电动汽车担忧，Rivian、Lucid 眼看创新低
item.description: 在福特汽车公司下调电动皮卡价格后，电动汽车初创企业 Rivian Automotive 公司和 Lucid Group 公司的股价周四跌至历史最低点。【原文：Shares of electric vehicle startups Rivian Automotive Inc. and Lucid Group Inc. are staring down all-time lows Thursday after Ford Motor Co. slashed prices on its electric pickup truck.】

item.title: S&P 公司称，越来越多的公司一再违约
item.description: 根据 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）的最新报告，不止一次拖欠债务的公司比例达到了 2008 年以来的第二高水平。【原文：The percentage of companies that have defaulted on their debt more than once has reached its second highest level since 2008, according to a new report from S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: KKR 联席首席执行官效仿伯克希尔模式，押注私募股权投资
item.description: KKR & Co.联席首席执行官 Joe Bae 和 Scott Nuttall 正在借鉴伯克希尔哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：KKR & Co. Co-Chief Executive Officers Joe Bae and Scott Nuttall are taking a cue from Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s business model by betting big on long-term private equity ownership and the ensuing dividends.】

item.title: 软银支持的独角兽企业 Rappi 聘请首席财务官为上市做准备
item.description: 拉美最有价值的初创企业之一 Rappi 公司聘请了首位首席财务官，为这家由软银支持的快递服务公司未来上市做准备。【原文：Rappi Inc., one of Latin America’s most valuable startups, hired its first chief financial officer to prepare the SoftBank-backed delivery service for a future public listing.】

item.title: 波兰可能向乌克兰捐赠更多的后苏联导弹
item.description: 波兰总统安杰伊-杜达（Andrzej Duda）与乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）讨论了向乌克兰捐赠更多苏联解体后防空导弹的事宜，因为乌克兰正遭受着猛烈的空袭。【原文：Poland’s President Andrzej Duda has discussed donating more post-Soviet air defense missiles to Ukraine with President Volodymyr Zelenskiy as his country comes under intense aerial assault.】

item.title: 这支 ETF 将让您如痴如醉
item.description:
MP3出现后，音乐产业的收入受到了巨大打击，但它找到了新的盈利方式。现在也有了 ETF。【原文：

The music industry took a huge revenue hit when the MP3 came along, but it’s found new ways to make money. Now there’s an ETF for that, too.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行计划降息，拉加德感受到美联储拖拉机的拉力
item.description: 2024年4月11日星期四，德国法兰克福，欧洲中央银行（ECB）行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）在利率决议新闻发布会上。欧洲央行在第五次会议上维持利率稳定，同时发出了迄今为止最明确的信号，即通胀降温将很快允许欧洲央行开始削减利率。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Christine Lagarde, president of the European Central Bank (ECB), at a rates decision news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, on Thursday, April 11, 2024. The ECB held interest rates steady for a fifth meeting, while sending its clearest signal yet that cooling inflation will soon allow it to commence cuts. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 哈尔-劳顿谈 Tractor Supply 的惊人增长
item.description:
销售镐、铲和宠物食品。【原文：

Selling picks and shovels and pet food.

】

item.title: 华尔街收回因私人信贷而损失的 160 亿美元交易
item.description: 越来越多的借款人利用信贷市场的持续反弹，将他们从直接贷款机构获得的贷款换成华尔街银行提供的更实惠的债务。【原文：Borrowers are increasingly swapping loans they received from direct lenders for more affordable debt from Wall Street banks, capitalizing on an ongoing rally in credit markets.】

item.title: Citadel 租赁的曼哈顿摩天大楼获得 9.11 亿美元融资
item.description: 肯-格里芬的 Citadel 公司是曼哈顿公园大道上一座新的摩天大楼的主要租户，该公司已获得 9.11 亿美元的再融资。【原文：A new skyscraper on Manhattan’s Park Avenue, where Ken Griffin’s Citadel is an anchor tenant, has secured a $911 million refinancing.】
